fields.name: Subheadline
fields.value: Join hundreds of teams using Oatmeal to deliver faster, friendlier email support.

blocks.aiDescription: Minimal CTA section with headline, rich text subheadline, and repeatable button items. No images. Supports alignment options. Use as the final section on any page. Choose this over CTA Highlight when the page should end clean and simple without a visual.

fields.name: Content
fields.value:
Agreement to Terms

By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

Use License

Permission is granted to temporarily use our services for personal, non-commercial purposes only.

Disclaimer

Our services are provided "as is" without any warranties, expressed or implied.

Contact

For questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@example.com.

blocks.aiDescription: General-purpose content section with headline, category tag, subheadline, and rich text body. Supports alignment. No images. Use for long-form text, about sections, policy pages, or any editorial content that does not fit a specialized block.

blocks.name: FAQ Two Column
blocks.template:
{{#if headline}}

{{headline}}

{{/if}} {{#if subheadline}}
{{{subheadline}}}
{{/if}}
{{#if (length questions)}}
{{#each questions}}
{{question}} {{icon "plus" size="20"}} {{icon "minus" size="20"}}
{{{answer}}}
{{/each}}
{{/if}}

fields.name: Subheadline
fields.value: Everything you need to know about our product and how it works.

value.question: How does the free trial work?
value.answer: Start your 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required.

value.question: Can I change my plan later?
value.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings.

value.question: What payment methods do you accept?
value.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

value.question: Is there a setup fee?
value.answer: No, there are no setup fees or hidden costs. You only pay for your subscription.

blocks.aiDescription: Two-column accordion FAQ with headline and subheadline. Questions split across two columns for denser layout. Best for 6+ questions. Place near the bottom, before final CTA. Choose this over single-column FAQ when there are many questions to save vertical space.

blocks.name: FAQ
blocks.template:
{{#if headline}}

{{headline}}

{{/if}} {{#if subheadline}}
{{{subheadline}}}
{{/if}}
{{#if (length questions)}}
{{#each questions}}
{{question}} {{icon "plus" size="20"}} {{icon "minus" size="20"}}
{{{answer}}}
{{/each}}
{{/if}}

fields.name: Subheadline
fields.value: Find answers to common questions about our product and services.

value.question: Do I need a credit card to start the free trial?
value.answer: No, you can start your 14-day free trial without entering any payment information. We'll only ask for payment details when you decide to upgrade.

value.question: Can my whole team use the same inbox?
value.answer: Yes! Oatmeal is built for team collaboration. You can invite unlimited team members on any plan, and everyone can access the shared inbox.

value.question: What integrations do you support?
value.answer: We integrate with Slack, Zapier, Gmail, Outlook, and many more. Check our integrations page for the full list.

value.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
value.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. No questions asked.

blocks.aiDescription: Single-column accordion FAQ with headline and subheadline. Questions expand/collapse on click. Best for 3-8 questions. Place near the bottom, before the final CTA. Choose this over FAQ Two Column when the page is narrow or question count is small (under 6).

value.title: Analyze insights

value.title: Take action

blocks.aiDescription: Stacked rows that alternate text and image left-to-right. Each feature item has title, description, and image. Best for 2-4 features that each need detailed explanation. Choose this over Features Grid when features need more space and visual storytelling per item.

value.title: Clean API
value.description: Simple, intuitive APIs that are a joy to work with.

value.title: Fast Performance

value.title: Secure by Default

value.title: Extensible

value.title: Great Docs

value.title: Active Community

blocks.aiDescription: One large demo image with a list of supporting features beside it. Each feature has icon, title, and description. Best for product/app pages where one hero visual anchors the section. Choose this when the product screenshot is the star and features support it.

fields.name: Subheadline
fields.value: Work smarter, reply faster, and keep every customer conversation right where it belongs.

value.headline: Shared Inbox
value.description: Keep every customer conversation in one clean, collaborative inbox.

value.headline: AI Assistant
value.description: Get valuable context without having to read through long email threads.

value.headline: Quick Replies
value.description: Respond faster with templates and snippets for common questions.

value.headline: Team Collaboration
value.description: Assign conversations, leave internal notes, and work together seamlessly.

value.headline: Analytics
value.description: Track response times, resolution rates, and team performance.

value.headline: Integrations
value.description: Connect with the tools you already use — Slack, Zapier, and more.

fields.name: Subheadline
fields.value: Simple, transparent pricing that grows with you. No hidden fees.

value.name: Starter
value.description: Perfect for small teams getting started.
value.features:
• Up to 5 team members
  • Basic analytics
  • Email support
  • 1GB storage

value.name: Growth
value.description: For growing teams that need more power.
value.features:
• Unlimited team members
  • Advanced analytics
  • Priority support
  • 10GB storage
  • API access

value.name: Enterprise
value.description: For large organizations with custom needs.
value.features:
• Everything in Growth
  • SSO & SAML
  • Dedicated support
  • Unlimited storage
  • Custom integrations

blocks.aiDescription: Multi-tier pricing table with repeatable plan items, each having name, price, feature list, and CTA button. Best for 2-4 plans side by side. Choose this over Pricing Large when the business offers multiple tiers or wants visitors to compare options.

fields.value: [{"id":"904e83af-a16f-40f1-80c7-8922b56862a3","name":"Lisa Wang","role":"Product Manager","photo":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1534528741775-53994a69daeb?w=400&h=533&fit=crop&crop=face"},{"id":"76be1b01-e26a-438c-8599-4d02ff629810","name":"Emily Johnson","role":"Head of Design","photo":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=400&h=533&fit=crop&crop=face"},{"id":"8e726354-f697-4fb5-8bf4-b5ea71b54422","name":"James Wilson","role":"Customer Success","photo":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=400&h=533&fit=crop&crop=face"},{"id":"59c53d6a-34ca-4fec-bd59-1eb245b5a8fa","name":"Sarah Chen","role":"CEO & Co-founder","photo":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?w=400&h=533&fit=crop&crop=face"},{"id":"5b172321-1f5b-4e6e-ac4b-eebabbe41ff6","name":"Michael Torres","role":"CTO & Co-founder","photo":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=400&h=533&fit=crop&crop=face"},{"id":"5e08c5ac-2b1d-4002-b2b4-6ce59af07a42","name":"David Kim","role":"Lead Engineer","photo":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?w=400&h=533&fit=crop&crop=face"}]

blocks.aiDescription: Team member grid with photo, name, and role per person. Has image field per member. Supports 2-4 column layout via select field. Best for 3-8 team members. Builds trust by showing real people. Place in the middle or lower section of about pages.

blocks.name: Testimonial Large

fields.name: Quote
fields.value: This platform has transformed how our team handles customer support. We've cut response times in half while actually improving customer satisfaction scores.

blocks.aiDescription: Two-column testimonial with a large photo on one side and quote on the other. Most visually dramatic testimonial option. Has image field. Choose this over standard Testimonial when you have a strong portrait photo and want maximum visual weight.

blocks.name: Testimonial

fields.name: Quote
fields.value: Oatmeal has completely transformed our customer support operations. The team collaboration features are incredible.

blocks.aiDescription: Single large testimonial quote with author image, name, and byline. High visual impact, takes full width. Has image field. Best for featuring one key endorsement. Choose this when you want one powerful quote, not multiple. Place after features as social proof.

fields.name: Headline
fields.value: Save land. Strengthen communities. Create a healthier planet.

fields.name: Text
fields.value: Together with our partners, we protect the places that sustain wildlife, provide clean air and water, and nurture healthy communities for generations to come.

fields.name: Highlights
fields.value: [{"id":"1","label":"Earning Ground","title":"Keep gaining ground","description":"Collaborate with local leaders to preserve lands rich with biodiversity.","image":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1441974231531-c6227db76b6e?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80","icon":"handshake"},{"id":"2","label":"Conservation Priorities","title":"Tackle urgent challenges","description":"Direct resources to habitats most vulnerable to climate threats.","image":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1433086966358-54859d0ed716?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80","icon":"target"},{"id":"3","label":"Land Conservation","title":"Protect what matters","description":"Safeguard working lands that provide food, jobs, and natural resilience.","image":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500534314209-a25ddb2bd429?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80","icon":"shield-check"}]
